lead_paragraph: New Orleans has been selected as the host city for the 2022 men's college basketball Final Four, the NCAA announced on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: NCAA Announces New Orleans Will Host 2022 Final 4
headline.main: NCAA Announces New Orleans Will Host 2022 Final 4

snippet: New Orleans has been selected as the host city for the 2022 men's college basketball Final Four, the NCAA announced on Thursday....
